Raiders centre Curtis Scott has been given a backdated three-game ban and a $15000 fine by the NRL for bringing the game into disrepute after a fracas at a Canberra bar.
Scott has been stood down by… [+1946 chars]

articles.author: Christopher Knaus
articles.title: Former Wallabies star Quade Cooper says Australian citizenship bid rejected - The Guardian Australia
articles.description: The New Zealand-born rugby player, who has lived in Australia since the age of 13, takes to Twitter to complain
articles.content:
The rugby player Quade Cooper says he has had his application for Australian citizenship rejected despite playing more than 70 Tests for the Wallabies.
Cooper, 33, was born in Auckland and still hol… [+2129 chars]
